price: 10.Toysa keenih qambal nabiyow qaran qeltu (qellu) sinni qer baahuwaa saaku.
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
